subject: Soccer
Steroids
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: FIFA banned North Korea from the 2015 Women’s World Cup after five players tested positive for steroids from traditional musk deer gland therapy at the tournament last month.
snippet: FIFA banned North Korea from the 2015 Women’s World Cup after five players tested positive for steroids from traditional musk deer gland therapy at the tournament last month.
